data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in West Azarbaijan, Iran, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of West Azarbaijan, Iran
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of West Azarbaijan.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 3,204,097 lost people in  West Azarbaijan, Iran have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 17,011 believers in West Azarbaijan against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Kurd, Central people might believe through him.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of West Azarbaijan.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in West Azarbaijan, Iran to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary:
the state of West Azarbaijan, Iran has a population of 3,265,200.

We estimate West Azarbaijan has 17,011 people who might know Jesus, 44,092 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,204,097 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to West Azarbaijan, Iran.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.
